meanings.definition: Characterized by the process of exuding or oozing out fluid.
meanings.sent1: The exudative wound was leaking fluid slowly.
meanings.sent2: The doctor identified the exudative nature of the wound.
meanings.sent3: The exudative puddle seemed to have a mind of its own.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes were exudative with tears of joy.
meanings.sent5: The exudative flower petals glistened in the sunlight.

meanings.definition: Relating to or causing the discharge of fluid from a wound or inflamed tissue.
meanings.sent1: The exudative bandage needed changing frequently.
meanings.sent2: The exudative infection required immediate attention.
meanings.sent3: The exudative wound seemed to have a sense of humor.
meanings.sent4: His exudative words poured out like a waterfall.
meanings.sent5: The exudative tissue was a clear sign of infection.
